description.value:
Type: Exarch

Alignment: Chaotic Evil

Gender: Male

Sphere: Frenzy

Dominion: Nishrek

Priests: Shamans

Adjective: Vapran

The rapacious god of the ogres, Vaprak is a god of combat, destruction, aggression, frenzy, and greed.

Published in Forgotten Realms Campaign Guide, page(s) 81.
